content: What 1993 film features a group of dinosaurs brought back to life on an island theme park, leading to disastrous consequences?

The 1993 film you're referring to is "Jurassic Park." Directed by Steven Spielberg and based on Michael Crichton's novel of the same name, it tells the story of a group of scientists and visitors who are stranded on an island after a theme park featuring cloned dinosaurs is sabotaged, leading to disastrous consequences as the dinosaurs escape their enclosures and threaten the lives of the characters. The film was a groundbreaking success, combining cutting-edge visual effects with a compelling narrative and has since become a classic in the science fiction and adventure genres.
